schemes.name: PM-KISAN Samman Nidhi
schemes.description: Income support of Rs.6000 per year to all farmer families across the country in three equal installments of Rs.2000 each every four months.
schemes.benefits: Rs. 6,000 per year transferred directly to bank account in 3 installments
schemes.how_to_apply: Visit nearest CSC center or apply online at pmkisan.gov.in

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana
schemes.ministry: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
schemes.description: Affordable housing scheme providing financial assistance for construction or enhancement of houses for the urban and rural poor.
schemes.benefits: Subsidy up to Rs. 2.67 Lakh on home loan interest rate. Houses provided to eligible beneficiaries.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through nearest bank branch or online at pmaymis.gov.in

schemes.name: Ayushman Bharat - PM Jan Arogya Yojana
schemes.ministry: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
schemes.description: World's largest health insurance scheme providing free health coverage of Rs. 5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
schemes.benefits: Free health insurance cover of Rs. 5,00,000 per family per year at empaneled hospitals
schemes.how_to_apply: Visit nearest Ayushman Bharat center or call 14555

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
schemes.ministry: Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas
schemes.description: Free LPG connections to women from Below Poverty Line (BPL) households to replace unclean cooking fuels.
schemes.benefits: Free LPG connection with Rs. 1,600 financial support for buying gas cylinder and stove
schemes.how_to_apply: Visit nearest LPG distributor with required documents

schemes.name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
schemes.description: Small savings scheme for girl child providing high interest rate and tax benefits. Account opened for girls below 10 years of age.
schemes.benefits: 8.2% interest rate with tax exemption under 80C. Matures when girl turns 21.
schemes.how_to_apply: Visit any Post Office or authorized bank branch

schemes.name: PM Mudra Yojana
schemes.description: Provides loans up to Rs. 10 lakh to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro enterprises for business purposes.
schemes.benefits: Business loans: Shishu (up to 50K), Kishor (50K-5L), Tarun (5L-10L) without collateral
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply at any bank, NBFC, or MFI branch

schemes.name: National Scholarship Portal - Post Matric Scholarship
schemes.description: Scholarships for SC/ST/OBC/Minority students studying in post-matriculation level to support their education expenses.
schemes.benefits: Full tuition fee reimbursement + monthly maintenance allowance of Rs. 1,200-3,000
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply online at National Scholarship Portal

schemes.name: Atal Pension Yojana
schemes.description: Guaranteed pension scheme for unorganized sector workers. Monthly pension of Rs. 1,000-5,000 after age 60.
schemes.benefits: Guaranteed monthly pension of Rs. 1,000 to Rs. 5,000 after age 60 based on contribution
schemes.how_to_apply: Visit any bank branch where you have savings account

schemes.name: Stand Up India
schemes.description: Bank loans between Rs. 10 lakh and Rs. 1 crore to SC/ST and women entrepreneurs for setting up greenfield enterprises.
schemes.benefits: Composite loan of Rs. 10 lakh to Rs. 1 crore for manufacturing, services or trading sector
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply at any Scheduled Commercial Bank branch or online

schemes.name: PM Vishwakarma Yojana
schemes.ministry: Ministry of Micro Small and Medium Enterprises
schemes.description: Support to traditional artisans and craftspeople with training, toolkit, credit support and market linkage.
schemes.benefits: Rs. 15,000 toolkit grant + collateral free loans up to Rs. 3 lakh + skill training
schemes.how_to_apply: Register at nearest CSC or online portal

schemes.name: Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme
schemes.description: Monthly pension to persons with severe or multiple disabilities living below poverty line aged 18-79 years.
schemes.benefits: Monthly pension of Rs. 300 (18-79 years) and Rs. 500 (80+ years) from Central Government
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through District Social Welfare Office or Gram Panchayat

schemes.name: PM Shram Yogi Maandhan Yojana
schemes.description: Pension scheme for unorganized workers like street vendors, rickshaw pullers, domestic workers ensuring Rs.3000 monthly pension after age 60.
schemes.benefits: Guaranteed monthly pension of Rs. 3,000 after attaining age of 60 years
schemes.how_to_apply: Visit nearest CSC center with Aadhaar and bank account details

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
schemes.description: Crop insurance scheme providing financial support to farmers suffering crop loss or damage due to natural calamities, pests and diseases.
schemes.benefits: Insurance coverage at premium of only 2% for Kharif, 1.5% for Rabi and 5% for commercial crops
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through bank, CSC center or insurance company before sowing season

schemes.name: Mahila Shakti Kendra
schemes.ministry: Ministry of Women and Child Development
schemes.description: Empowerment of rural women through community participation and awareness on government schemes, health and nutrition.
schemes.benefits: Skill development training, digital literacy, health awareness, scheme enrollment assistance
schemes.how_to_apply: Contact nearest Anganwadi center or Block Development Office

schemes.name: Majhi Kanya Bhagyashree Yojana
schemes.description: Financial assistance to girl child from BPL families in Maharashtra. Provides insurance and savings for girl's future.
schemes.benefits: Rs. 50,000 insurance + fixed deposit amount given to girl on turning 18 years
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Gram Panchayat or Municipal Corporation office

schemes.name: Kanya Sumangala Yojana
schemes.ministry: Uttar Pradesh Government - Women Welfare Department
schemes.description: Financial assistance of Rs. 15,000 to families of UP for girl child from birth to graduation in 6 installments.
schemes.benefits: Total Rs. 15,000 in 6 stages: birth(2000), vaccination(1000), class1(2000), class6(2000), class9(3000), graduation(5000)
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply online at mksy.up.gov.in or through District Probation Officer

schemes.name: Chiranjeevi Swasthya Bima Yojana
schemes.description: Universal health insurance for all families in Rajasthan providing cashless treatment up to Rs. 25 lakh per family per year.
schemes.benefits: Cashless treatment up to Rs. 25 lakh per family per year at empaneled hospitals
schemes.how_to_apply: Register at nearest e-Mitra center or hospital with Jan Aadhaar

schemes.name: Amma Two Wheeler Scheme
schemes.ministry: Tamil Nadu Government - Social Welfare Department
schemes.description: 50% subsidy on purchase of two-wheelers for working women in Tamil Nadu to support their daily commute.
schemes.benefits: 50% subsidy up to Rs. 25,000 on purchase of two-wheeler for working women
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply online through Tamil Nadu Government portal

schemes.name: Bhagya Lakshmi Scheme
schemes.description: Financial assistance to girl children from BPL families in Karnataka from birth to class 10 completion.
schemes.benefits: Rs. 19,300 over stages + Rs. 1 lakh bond maturity at age 18. Health insurance of Rs. 25,000.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Anganwadi center or Gram Panchayat within 1 year of birth

schemes.name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana
schemes.description: Skill training and placement program for rural youth from poor families aged 15-35 years with focus on regular monthly wages.
schemes.benefits: Free skill training (3-12 months) + guaranteed placement with minimum Rs. 6,000 monthly salary
schemes.how_to_apply: Contact nearest Gram Panchayat or Block Development Office
